entry.title: 2TB NVME SSD
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Vision House
Type: Solid State Drives
Price: 549.00

The Film Drives '2TB NVME SSD' is a portable, on-set solid state drive that delivers consistent offload speeds. Utilising under clocked NVMe Storage alongside a superior thermal design allows for all day backups without compromise.

The Film Drives '2TB NVME SSD' boasts 960MB/s Write Speeds and 950MB/s Read Speeds. For maximum performance it comes equipped with a USB-C Port to leverage the faster speeds offered by USB 3.2 Gen 2. Compatible with Thunderbolt 3/4 Ports as well as older USB-A Ports (via a USB-C to USB-A Cable).

Set the new standard of professionalism with our SSD Labelling System. Use the Film Drives 'Label Maker' App to quickly generate unique SSD Labels for every job. The big, easy to read labels simply slide into the plastic pouch built into every Film Drives Case. Stick the second label on the drive itself and stay super organised.

With the Film Drives 'Set Ready Protective Case' your pack down will be quick, your cables will be organised and your data will be safe. Housing your rushes in the durable case trumps a cardboard box any day, shield your production while in transit and ensure safe end-to-end delivery for you and your client.

s:variant.title: Local Pickup at The Vision House (Melbourne)
